alert.note: Alert for Chilton (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chilton and Coosa Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 554 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weogufka, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockford, Weogufka, Stewartville, Hanover, Lyle, Pentonville, Mitchell Lake, Dollar, Strickland Crossroads, Bentleyville, Lay Lake Dam, Unity, Marble Valley, Moriah, Higgins Ferry Park, Crewsville, Lay Lake, Paint Creek, Mitchell Dam and Hissop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
